title: SMNTY Classics: Romantic Comedy Sidekicks
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: Romantic Comedy Sidekicks
description:
Sidekicks are an integral part of any romantic comedy. In this classic episode and part three of their rom com series, Cristen and Caroline examine the ways these sometimes neurotic, sometimes wise secondary characters trade on stereotypes to shape the protagonists' world.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
